name: Free Range Brains (Brackeys Jam 2023.1)
description:
RUN IN FULL SCREEN!
The end of the human race is here. And the start of the zombie race is beginning! Become part of the construction of the new zombie economy and feed the community by being a human farmer! This game was made in 1 week for the 2023.1 Brackeys Game Jam.

ControlsMovementWASDArrow Keys

How to play

Chase after the unpredictable humans once you get close enough to a human you will catch it. Once you have caught the human run to the hole without hitting any other zombies if you do you will drop the zombie and be stunned for a short amount of time and the zombie will run away. Once you get to the hole walk up to the edge and you will automatically drop the zombie into the hole gaining you 100 points. Repeat this until the time runs out. Try and get as many points as possible and try to beat your high score. Good Luck.

Credits

All made by Tiny_Tree.
